    Game.checkMergeIsland(Island island1, Island island2)

  • Uses of Island in it.polimi.ingsw.game_model.utils

    Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.game_model.utils with parameters of type Island
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Optional<Player>
    CalculatorInfluence.evaluate(List<Player> players, Island island)
    If the game's rules include teams of players this function evaluates team influence: at first it creates teams from the list of players; for each team(a list of players with the same color) it evaluates the team influence which will be the sum of each team member's influence; then it compares each team's influence, in case it founds a most influencing team, return the list of players of the most influencing team; in case of a draw(no team has a unique maximal value of influence), it frees the current island and returns an empty player list.
    int
    CalculatorInfluence.evaluateForPlayer(Player player, Island island)
    Sum tower influence and student influence of the player
    protected int
    CalculatorInfluence.playerStudentInfluence(Player player, Island island)
    Given a player and an island of the board, calculate the influence brought by the students on the island itself.
    protected int
    CalculatorInfluence.playerTowerInfluence(Player player, Island island)
    Given a player and an island of the board, returns the influence given by the control of any tower on that island.

    IslandBoard(Island island, boolean hasMotherNature, int islandIndex)
    Constructor method, create the island ring, current students on each island, current tower number, island index, current color of towers built on the island(there can be only towers with the same color), deniedCounter(a property of an island given by an advanced card), the presence of mother nature and island ID.
